name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior Operations Engineer with 8 years of robust experience in cloud services and DevOps practices. Proficient in **AWS**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, **CI/CD**, **Kubernetes**, **GitLab CI**, **Helm**, **Argo CD**, **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, **CloudWatch**, and **IAM**, I excel in building efficient, scalable, and secure cloud infrastructure. My expertise includes implementing incident response strategies, performance tuning, cost optimization, and enhancing observability across systems to ensure operational excellence.

With a solid foundation in microservices architecture and extensive hands-on experience managing complex deployments, I am adept at automating workflows and improving deployment pipelines through continuous integration and delivery. My previous roles in the healthcare and financial sectors have honed my skills in compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS, supporting enterprise-grade applications. Additionally, my background in machine learning and AI/ML integration complements my ability to drive innovative solutions.
